title: Parallelogram Calculator: Area, Perimeter, Height, Angles & Diagonals | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Area (base & height): \( A = b \cdot h \) Area (sides & angle): \( A = a \cdot b \cdot \sin(\theta) \) Perimeter: \( P = 2(a + b) \) Height (relative to a): \( h = b \cdot \sin(\theta) \) Diagonals: \( d_1 = \sqrt{a^2 + b^2 - 2ab\cos(\theta)} \), \( d_2 = \sqrt{a^2 + b^2 + 2ab\cos(\theta)} \) Area (diagonals & angle φ): \( A = \frac{d_1 d_2 \sin(\varphi)}{2} \)
